text: Bob Finney was an American race car driverJim Merrill, Potsy Gow,Tony and Merle Finney,Lou and Dick Frenzel, Bob Finney - foto. He won the Pikes Peak International Hill ClimbThe Pikes Peak International Hill Climb, still growing after 96 years. Retrieved April 28, 2020. in 1955, when he was part of the AAA Championship Car. Fanny also won this race in 1957, but at that time he was no longer part of the USAC Championship.PPIHC All Time Kings of the Mountain (1916-2018). Retrieved April 28, 2020. He has a total of 6 AAA Championship races between 1950 and 1955.Bob Finney. Retrieved April 28, 2020.Bob Finney.
